name: ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF
description: ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITI) is an innovative exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investors with exposure to the price movements of Bitcoin through futures contracts rather than directly holding the cryptocurrency. Launched in 2022, BITI allows investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin's performance while addressing the complexities and risks associated with direct cryptocurrency investments. The fund is designed to track the performance of Bitcoin futures contracts traded on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME), making it accessible to both retail and institutional investors. By investing in BITI, individuals can participate in the growing cryptocurrency market while benefiting from the regulatory oversight and operational infrastructure of the traditional financial markets. ProShares has a strong reputation for developing sophisticated financial products, and BITI reflects the growing demand for Bitcoin-related investment options. As the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, BITI provides a strategic way for investors to diversify their portfolios and hedge against market volatility. The ETF encompasses a range of investment strategies, focusing on capturing the potential upside of Bitcoin while managing the inherent risks involved with futures trading.
